March 2023 Edition

Welcome to the Latest Edition of 
The Justia Insider

Spring is in the air, the days are getting longer, and the sun is a little brighter. Let’s celebrate! This month’s edition highlights all the good stuff that went down in February. Thank you all for your hard work and dedication. Having big, ambitious goals is essential; however, breaking them down into easy-to-complete tasks can raise your inner confidence and give you a feeling of achievement. Keep reading so you don’t miss out on company information and news!

JUSTIA PORTAL NEWS

Take a Look at the Ongoing Development of Our Consumer Portal

  • New Centers: We’ve created the content for International Law, Constitutional Law, Communications and Internet Law, and Entertainment Law during this past month.
  • COVID-19 Updates: We’ve continued to update the 50-state surveys on mask mandates, travel restrictions, evictions, court operations, and general restrictions.
  • Criminal Law Center: Our team has added hundreds of informational boxes to these pages to improve their readability.
  • Divorce Center: We’ve started expanding and updating these pages to cover a broader range of issues and needs.

UPCOMING HOLIDAYS

Dates to Remember

Benito Juarez was one of Mexico's presidents and a national hero. Without a doubt, he is one of Mexico's most respected leaders. Juarez was a lawyer who held many public offices as a state legislator, civil judge, government secretary, and governor. As a president, he made substantial changes and reforms to create a democratic federal republic.

TEAM ACTIVITY

Justia Super Bowl Challenge

The Chiefs defeated the Eagles to win Super Bowl LVII in one of the most thrilling Super Bowls we've seen! Thank you to everyone who enthusiastically participated in this year's edition. Congratulations to the 2023 Justia Super Bowl Challenge winners, Haydee Garcia, Arturo Jara, and Ismael Muñoz, who received Amazon gift cards!

REVIEWS & RECOMMENDATIONS

Avatar: The Last Airbender

Available on Netflix

"In a war-torn world of elemental magic, a young boy reawakens to undertake a dangerous mystic quest to fulfill his destiny as the Avatar and bring peace to the world. Besides the classic twist of the main character developing his superpowers, this series also deals with topics such as sexism, dictatorship, and trauma and its implications on healthy human development. The series also addresses the importance of making decisions, understanding limitations as opportunity areas, introspection, and how to guide your life to find your destiny. This show is currently streaming on Netflix. Give it a try! Once you begin watching, you won’t stop!"

- Genaro Osoria

Collaborators: Alejandra Medina, Alejandro Moreno, Arturo Jara, Erika Azuela, Haydee Garcia, Jose Ramos, Lauren Moskie, Miguel Berlanga, Rene Peralta, and Zoraida Vallejo.
